s.text: The main sticking point in the talks is that the Serbs don't want NATO forces to police the agreement in Kosovo while the United States says this is non-negotiable.

In fact, the British minister is quoted in the WP as saying that "no one is predicting [the problems] will be gone" by the new deadline three days from now, adding that "there is no guarantee of a happy story."
